title: "Business building" means any building or part thereof used for transaction of business and/or keeping of accounts and record there for; offices, banks, professional establishments, IT establishments, call centers, offices for private entrepreneur, provided their principal function is transaction of business and/or keeping of books and records
clause_text: "Business building" means any building or part thereof used for transaction of business and/or keeping of accounts and record there for; offices, banks, professional establishments, IT establishments, call centers, offices for private entrepreneur, provided their principal function is transaction of business and/or keeping of books and records.
